content:
I'm happy to remind you! According to our previous conversation, you mentioned that you enjoy taking dance classes on weekends, but you didn't specify the exact style(s) of dance. You only mentioned that you'd like to keep your weekend dance classes as part of your routine.

If you'd like to share more about your dance classes, I'd be happy to learn more and provide more tailored advice. What type of dance do you enjoy? Is it ballet, contemporary, hip hop, salsa, or something else? And how often do you attend these classes - is it every Saturday, every Sunday, or alternating weekends?
